sections.heading: Short title.  This Act may be cited as the Display of

Tobacco product displays.  All single packs of cigarettes, and electronic cigarettes, and alternative nicotine products must be sold from behind the counter or in an age restricted area or in a sealed display case
sections.text: Any other tobacco products must be sold in line of sight.

sections.heading: Vending machines.  This Act does not prohibit the sale
sections.text:
of tobacco products, electronic cigarettes, or alternative nicotine products from vending machines if the location of the
vending machines are in compliance with the provisions of Section 1 of
the Prevention of Tobacco Use by Persons under
21 Years of Age and Sale and Distribution of Tobacco Products
Act.

sections.heading: Sentence.  A violation of this Act is a petty offense for which
sections.text: the court shall impose a fine of not less than $100 nor more than $1,000.

sections.heading: Effective date. This Act takes effect January 1, 2005.
sections.text: Effective date. This Act takes effect January 1, 2005.
